## Self-Review Checklist (Mandatory)

### Quality Gates
- [ ] `bun run format:check` passes
- [ ] `bun run lint` passes
- [ ] `bun run typecheck` passes
- [ ] `bun run build` passes

### Functional Confidence
- [ ] Core flow manually tested
- [ ] Error/empty/loading states checked (if applicable)
- [ ] Regression risk assessed and acceptable

### Security and Data Safety
- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Tenant/data boundaries preserved
- [ ] Authz remains server-side for sensitive actions
- [ ] Threat model completed for high-risk changes (`docs/03-architecture/threat-model-lite.md`)
- [ ] Security review report completed for major/high-risk changes (`docs/06-quality/security-review-report-template.md`)
- [ ] Deferred risk recorded in `docs/07-devops/security-exception-register.md` (if any)

### Documentation and Governance
- [ ] Relevant docs updated under `docs/`
- [ ] Major trade-offs logged in `docs/02-planning/decision-log.md`
- [ ] Release/rollback notes included for risky changes

- Screenshots/logs (if useful):
